verses.name: Judges 20:43
verses.text: Thus they inclosed the Benjamites round about, and chased them, and trode them down with ease over against Gibeah toward the sunrising.

verses.name: Judges 20:44
verses.text: And there fell of Benjamin eighteen thousand men; all these were men of valour.

verses.name: Judges 20:45
verses.text: And they turned and fled toward the wilderness unto the rock of Rimmon: and they gleaned of them in the highways five thousand men; and pursued hard after them unto Gidom, and slew two thousand men of them.

verses.name: Judges 20:46
verses.text: So that all which fell that day of Benjamin were twenty and five thousand men that drew the sword; all these were men of valour.
